## HashChangeEvent.targetElementBoundingRect property

The bounding rectangle of the element targeted by hash. See [Element.getBoundingClientRect()](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/getBoundingClientRect)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
targetElementBoundingRect: DOMRect;
```
